courseDescription:
In this free online course, you will gain an in-depth understanding of the science of thermodynamics. You will learn about its technologies, applications and benefits.

The course begins by explaining some basic concepts associated with thermodynamics, such as systems and state postulates, specific heat and gravity, temperature and pressure scale, equilibrium and processes. Energy and efficiency of machines are analyzed, as well as the equations of state and the working principles of heat engines. In addition, you will learn about the principles of Entropy and Exergy.

The following part of the course focuses on power cycles, processes associated with gas power cycles and vapour power cycles. Finally, you will explore thermodynamic property relations and chemical reactions. This course will be of interest to students studying science and engineering courses. It will also be beneficial to those working in the industrial sector, as well as those seeking employment in this area. Start this course today and learn more about engineering thermodynamics.
